about_the_game:
Exciting Secret Agent Adventures

Island Ops will take you on a thrilling adventure as you slip into the shoes of a secret agent, codename Blade. Infiltrate a secret military base and discover a litany of mysteries contained within.

Strategic Infiltration and Reconnaissance Missions

Use your intelligence and cunning to infiltrate the secret facility. But that is just the beginning. Pay careful attention to every detail to create a dynamic plan. Explore every aspect of the facility to determine who the real threat is. Your life depends on it!

Filled with Unexpected Surprises

You'll encounter something unexpected in the research facility and trace the traces of extraordinary experiments. In this mysterious world, the importance of your decisions and actions is significant. You must plan each step carefully and use your creativity to solve unexpected situations.

Action-Packed Obstacles and Challenges

Agent Blade must overcome all obstacles inside the facility with his mind and weapon. By using your skills, you'll need to strategically navigate a path to defeat enemies and successfully complete your mission.

Save the World, Stop the Outbreak!

The secret experiment in the research facility has turned into a mutation outbreak. Blade is taking action to destroy these dangerous mutations. The world's salvation depends on your decisions and fighting strength.

An Experience of Fun and Adrenaline

"Island Ops" will pull you into a story full of suspense, action, and mystery. Guide your character, use your intelligence and skills to save the world!

This game appeals to any player who wants to explore its mysterious world and embark on an action-packed adventure. With its captivating story, challenging puzzles, and action-packed scenes, "Island Ops" offers an unforgettable gaming experience!

name: Island Ops

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: i5-3470 INTEL or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: i7-4790K INTEL or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: "Make the leap; dive into Island Ops! Unexpected obstacles await. Overcome them as the skilled secret agent, Blade. The secrets of hidden experiments and genetic mutations lie waiting to be discovered. Are you ready for an action-packed adventure?"
